<remarks>If you need only one month you can use the same value for {rangeFrom} and {rangeTo}</remarks>

parameters.name: rangeFrom
parameters.description: The start of the date range, it's going to be flattened as the first day of {rangeFrom} month

parameters.name: rangeTo
parameters.description:
The end of the date range, it's going to be flattened as the last day of {rangeTo} month
            It needs to be inferior or equal to {rangeFrom}

post.summary:
Create a new preference for a user on a specific entity.
If Type is NOT_INTERESTED, the valid FeedbackReason must be provided.
post.description:
If a preference for this user on this entity already exists this one will replace it.
            In order to add NOT_INTERESTED preference, there is a need to provide FeedbackReason.
            To get all valid NOT_INTERESTED feedback reasons, the API GET api/feedback/notinterested/all should be called.

delete.summary: Remove a new preference for a user on a specific entity
